translation.en: [woman] The Mega Mitten. The power's not just in your hands.
translation.it: Il Mega Guantone. Il potere non è nelle tue mani.

translation.en: -[video game weapon firing] -[woman] It is your hands.
translation.it: Il Mega Guantone. Il potere non è nelle tue mani. Le tue mani sono il potere.

translation.en: The Mega Mitten.
For the Nextronico Gaming Entertainment System.
translation.it: Per la console di videogiochi Nextronico.

translation.en: Now you are one with the games.
[man] Coming up next , it's an all-new Saturday Morning All Star Hits!
translation.it: In arrivo una nuova puntata del Saturday Morning All Star Hits!

translation.en: with Skip and Treybor!
Whoa! What's up, kids? I'm Skip!
translation.it: Come va, bambini? Io sono Skip.

translation.en: And I'm Treybor. And we're the new hosts of S.M.A.S.H.!
translation.it: E io Treybor. Siamo i nuovi conduttori di SMASH!

translation.en: -Saturday… -Morning…
-…All… -…Star…
[both] Hits!
Wait, if it's Saturday, why are we at school?
translation.it: Aspetta. Se è sabato, perché siamo a scuola?

translation.en: 'Cause we're finally gonna make school fun by adding TV!
translation.it: Finalmente renderemo la scuola divertente con la televisione!

translation.en: If this is school, then I say more detention, please.
translation.it: Se questa è la scuola, io vorrei più castighi, per favore.

translation.en: Today's assignment, watch the totally tubular cartoonage we got smashin' at ya!
translation.it: Compito di oggi: guardare il nostro cartone spaccosissimo!

translation.en: Plus, we got a super sizzlin' sneak peek at the new Johnny Rash movie!
translation.it: E abbiamo anche un'anteprima del nuovo film di Johnny Rash!

translation.en: Yeah, and I've got a sneak peek at the doggy dance.
translation.it: Sì, e io ho un'anteprima… della Doggy Dance.

translation.en: -[funky music playing] -Skip, you're doggone crazy.
translation.it: Skip, sei matto come un cane.

translation.en: Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!
We'll be right bark-- I mean, back! After an all-new episode of…
translation.it: Torniamo baubito… Subito. Dopo un nuovo episodio di…

translation.en: [both] Randy! Ah!
♪ Randy ♪
♪ Our best dino pal ♪
♪ He came from long ago But lives with us now ♪
translation.it: Arrivato da molto tempo fa Ma ora vive con noi

translation.en: ♪ Adventures ♪ ♪ Are always in store ♪
♪ He and the gang are ready to explore ♪
translation.it: Lui e la banda sono pronti a esplorare

translation.en: ♪ But ♪ ♪ It ain't easy being big and green With teeth that look mean ♪
translation.it: Ma non è facile essere grandi e verdi Con dentoni spaventosi

translation.en: ♪ But he's a cool skater dude ♪
translation.it: Ma è un simpatico skater Con un bello spirito

translation.en: ♪ With a good attitude you'll see ♪
translation.it: Ma è un simpatico skater Con un bello spirito Vedrete! AUTO USATE

translation.en: ♪ Randy ♪ ♪ The biggest heart in town ♪
translation.it: Randy, il cuore più grande della città

translation.en: ♪ So come on, everybody And gather around ♪
♪ And meet Randy ♪
So… th… that's just it then?
I guess so.
Would you want to, like, take some time away from each other and…
translation.it: Non potremmo solo prenderci una pausa

translation.en: and maybe just s-see where we're at?
translation.it: e poi vedere a che punto siamo?

translation.en: I don't think so, Randy.
But I… I could be better.
I think this is just how it has to be.
I really do love you so much.
Love you too.
[man on radio] Task Force 27 to 200 North Main Street.
translation.it: Task Force 27 a 200 North Main Street.

translation.en: [man screams on radio] Terry!
[sniffles] I should go.
Yeah.
Oh. Okay.
-[grunts] -[girlfriend] No, just--
My legs always get kinda caught on this thing right here.
translation.it: Mi si incastrano sempre le gambe.

translation.en: -Your tail's hitting the-- -Damn it!
[girlfriend] It's fine. It's fine. It's fine.
-[siren stops] -Well, see ya.
No, uh… uh… Michael's upstairs.
Just tell him I'm not here.
[softly] I hate myself.
-What was that? -[music stops]
Nothing.
[whispers] I said I hate myself.
-Okay, I… I can't quite make it out. -[music stops]
But, uh, it sounds like you're saying that you don't like yourself.
translation.it: ma mi sembra che tu stia dicendo che non ti piaci.

translation.en: [whispering] I didn't say I don't like myself.
translation.it: Non ho detto che non mi piaccio.

translation.en: -I said I hate myself. -[melancholic music starts, then stops]
Now it sounds like you're sort of, uh, quietly correcting me,
translation.it: Ora mi sembra che tu mi stia correggendo sottovoce

translation.en: and I'm just very concerned about you, Randy.
translation.it: e sono preoccupato per te, Randy.

translation.en: All right, Dr. Kottrellberg, seems like you fixed me.
translation.it: Ok, dr. Kottrellberg, mi hai guarito.

translation.en: -Really? -[softly] No.
All right, well, just take care of yourself.
translation.it: D'accordo. Beh, prenditi cura di te.

translation.en: I forgot to tell you one thing, Dr. K,
translation.it: Ho dimenticato di dirti una cosa, dr. K.

translation.en: that I wish I was extinct.
Hey, Dr. Kottrellberg, can Randy come out and hang with us?
translation.it: Dr. Kottrellberg, Randy può uscire con noi?

translation.en: Uh, I'm afraid he's… he's not feeling well, Michael.
translation.it: Temo che non si senta bene, Michael.

translation.en: Dr. K, is Randy around?
Maybe try next week, Shawna.
Is Randy free?
Not gonna happen, Rocko.
[kids clamoring] Randy! Randy! Come on!
Yeah, Randy, come on.
Let's live our lives!
We're only young once! Come on, let's play!
translation.it: Si è giovani una volta sola! Forza, giochiamo!

translation.en: The whole gang's here!
[chanting] Randy! Randy! Randy! Randy!
I told you guys, he's still the same old Randy.
translation.it: Ve l'ho detto, è sempre il buon vecchio Randy.

translation.en: [Michael] Oh, buddy.
[Skip, Treybor] Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.it: Il Saturday Morning All Star Hits! torna dopo lo spot.

translation.en: ♪ Rogo! ♪
[girl] Little crafts… -[child] Can you please give me a cat? -[boy] No!
Can't you read the sign?
Can't you read the sign?
translation.it: E tu lo sai leggere? NON FARE SILENZIO, TANTO MANGIARE

translation.en: You're in big trouble, young man!
Oh no. Guess I better book it.
Let's just watch more Randy.
Wait, so she was just like, "We're not doing this anymore"?
translation.it: E lei ti ha detto solo che è finita?

translation.en: I guess it was sort of like, we got our whole lives ahead of us.
translation.it: Ha parlato del fatto che abbiamo tutta la vita davanti

translation.en: And 'cause I, like, live in a museum basement,
translation.it: e che, siccome vivo nella cantina di un museo,

translation.en: and I don't kiss her as much anymore,
translation.it: non la bacio più come prima

translation.en: and I get drunk a lot, I'm maybe not a good partner.
translation.it: e mi ubriaco spesso, forse non sono un buon compagno.

translation.en: -What does she mean? -That's dumb.
Pshh. Girls are weird, dude.
By my calculations, she doesn't deserve you.
translation.it: Secondo i miei calcoli, lei non ti merita. RANDY SPACCA

translation.en: [chuckles] Thanks, Digit.
Well, we're psyched to have you back, man.
translation.it: È una figata che sei tornato.

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
I mean, I… I guess she's sort of right.
I've never really pushed myself.
Maybe 'cause I'm, like, a dinosaur.
I mean, I left the only world I knew,
translation.it: Ho lasciato l'unico mondo che conoscevo,

translation.en: got zapped into the future where I'm the last of my kind,
translation.it: sono stato catapultato nel futuro, ultimo della mia specie,

translation.en: then I find out I'm not even the last of my kind!
translation.it: e poi ho scoperto che non sono neppure l'ultimo!

translation.en: You guys should be wearing helmets.
-Shut up, Newton! -Go away, Newton!
I'll seriously kick your butt, dude!
translation.it: Ti prendo a calci in culo!

translation.en: Plus, I never told you guys,
translation.it: E poi, non ve l'ho mai detto,

translation.en: but I've never really been comfortable with my body.
translation.it: ma non sono mai stato a mio agio col mio corpo.

translation.en: Whoa, a house party!
You need a pal, don't ya?
Yeah, I guess.
Rad!
[drunkenly] Just admit it, human beings got lucky.
translation.it: Ammettetelo, gli esseri umani sono stati fortunati.

translation.en: Dinosaurs should've stayed on the planet.
translation.it: I dinosauri avrebbero dovuto restare sul pianeta.

translation.en: I mean, can a human do this?
[in a high-pitched voice] I said, can a human do this?
translation.it: Ho chiesto se un umano può farlo!

translation.en: Hey, Randy, take it easy, man.
I'm cool, dude.
-Whoops. -Holy crap!
-Fire! -[kids coughing]
[boy 1] Fire, man!
[boy 2] Oh my God, fire!
[boy 3] Run! Fire!
This is kind of crazy, right?
-You're still drinking. -What?
translation.it: Continui a bere? Che c'è? L'incendio è quasi estinto.

translation.en: The fire is almost gone.
translation.it: Che c'è? L'incendio è quasi estinto.

translation.en: There shouldn't have been a fire in the first place, Randy.
Oh, here we go. Please, tell me how much of a screw-up I am.
translation.it: Ci risiamo. Forza, dimmi quanto sono incasinato.

translation.en: Let's hear about my "bad hygiene,"
'cause when I say I'm brushing my teeth,
translation.it: perché quando dico che mi lavo i denti

translation.en: I'm actually just splashing the water around and thinking about playing video games.
translation.it: spruzzo solo acqua in giro e penso ai videogiochi.

translation.en: The point is, someone could've gotten seriously hurt here, Randy.
translation.it: Qualcuno avrebbe potuto farsi male sul serio, Randy.

translation.en: Yeah, but they didn't.
Maybe you should lighten up.
Hey, Randy, I think it's time for you to get out of here.
translation.it: Randy, è ora che tu te ne vada.

translation.en: Newton? I see what's happening here.
Cool. Gotcha.
Bye, Heather.
I hope I never see you again.
translation.it: Spero di non rivederti mai più.

translation.en: -[sirens wailing in the distance] -And just so you know, I was lying.
translation.it: E, per tua informazione, ho mentito.

translation.en: You suck at dancing.
You can't take that blanket with you!
-You okay? -Oh yeah. I'm…
I'm fine. It's just…
[huffs] …he's so frustrating.
I know. He's such a great dinosaur, but--
translation.it: Lo so. È un gran dinosauro, ma…

translation.en: Can be a jerk who spends so much time lounging…
translation.it: È anche un idiota che sta così tanto sul divano

translation.en: …you'd think he was supermodel Sasha Sinclair sunbathing on an exotic beach.
translation.it: da sembrare la top model Sasha Sinclair su una spiaggia esotica.

translation.en: There you go, little buddy.
-[inhaling] -[fireman] I don't think he'll make it.
translation.it: Non credo che ce la farà.

translation.en: It's like he could do anything he wanted if he just got out of his own way.
translation.it: Poteva fare qualsiasi cosa, se si fosse dato una svegliata.

translation.en: [gasps] I made it!
Like, seriously, he could go to school for doing drum machines.
translation.it: Potrebbe andare a scuola di batteria elettronica.

translation.en: -If I could weigh in here-- -Go home, Newton!
translation.it: - A mio parere… - Vai a casa, Newton!

translation.en: I guess… [scoffs] …Randy's just got to make his own choices.
translation.it: Credo che Randy debba fare le sue scelte.

translation.en: That's what hurts me most.
translation.it: È quello che fa più male.

translation.en: Just standing on the sidelines, watching him mess up his whole life.
translation.it: Stare in disparte e guardarlo mentre si rovina la vita.

translation.en: But I'm not his mom and I'm not his shrink,
translation.it: Ma non sono sua madre o il suo strizzacervelli,

translation.en: and maybe I shouldn't be his girlfriend.
translation.it: e forse non dovrei essere la sua ragazza.

translation.en: -[ambulance siren wailing] -You should make sure your friend's okay. You're a good person, Heather.
translation.it: - Controlla che stia bene. - Sei una brava persona, Heather.

translation.en: [Skip, Treybor] Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.it: Il Saturday Morning All Star Hits! torna dopo lo spot.

translation.en: [man] The battle for Strongar rages in your hands.
translation.it: La battaglia per Strongar infuria tra le tue mani.

translation.en: The War Boars will destroy your puny Peace Prisms. [snorts]
translation.it: I Cinghialieri distruggeranno i vostri miseri Prismi della Pace.

translation.en: -Back off, Hammer Hog. -[man] It's Tigor, with whip attack tail.
translation.it: - Indietro, Porcomartello! - C'è Tigor, con la coda frustante.

translation.en: My hatedar is picking up trouble.
-[man] Drogg, with real-feeling tongue. -It's so wet!
translation.it: Drogg, con la lingua realistica. È umidissima!

translation.en: [man] Kickaroo's fingernails really grow!
translation.it: Gli artigli di Kickaroo crescono davvero.

translation.en: And don't forget Guinja.
Fill him with water, freeze him overnight, and he makes real ice!
translation.it: Riempitelo d'acqua e mettetelo in freezer. Fa il ghiaccio!

translation.en: Hey, Skip, do you think there's intelligent life out there?
translation.it: Skip, pensi che là fuori ci sia vita intelligente?

translation.en: I don't think there's intelligent life in here.
translation.it: Non penso ci sia vita intelligente… qui dentro.

translation.en: Hey, that was rude.
Now check out Create-A-Crittles.
[narrator] Once upon a time,
a struggling young artist by the name of David Gnubbens
translation.it: un giovane artista in difficoltà di nome David Gnubbens

translation.en: stumbled upon magical creatures.
They taught him the true potential of creativity.
translation.it: che gli insegnarono il vero potenziale della creatività.

translation.en: The Create-A-Crittles.
[narrator] Little did David know,
he started a friendship that could never end.
The world just isn't ready for the Create-A-Crittles.
translation.it: Ma il mondo non è pronto per i Creatorsi.

translation.en: So David must keep them a secret from everyone, especially his family.
translation.it: David deve tenerli nascosti a tutti, specialmente alla sua famiglia.

translation.en: Oh no, please not tonight. No, not tonight.
Okay, great.
-Oh, hi. Is Fifi asleep? -Yep.
Are you prepared for your big corporate project meeting in the morning?
translation.it: Sei pronto per l'importante riunione di domani?

translation.en: -Yep. -I know you'll close the deal.
Yeah, I just gotta do one last thing and take out the trash.
translation.it: Sì, devo fare un'ultima cosa e portare fuori la spazzatura.

translation.en: -Don't wait up for me. -[suspenseful music playing]
It's Create-A-Crittle time--
[grunts] Crittles? Hello?
David, we thought you bailed on us.
Sorry I'm late, Brusho. I've just been really busy today.
translation.it: Scusa il ritardo, Penny. Ho avuto molto da fare.

translation.en: Trying to snip us out of your life?
translation.it: Vuoi tagliarci fuori dalla tua vita?

translation.en: Of course not, Scizzi.
Look, I love you guys. You give my life so much--
translation.it: Io vi voglio bene. Riempite la mia vita di…

translation.en: Color?
[laughs] Argie B, you said it.
So here we are, my three best friends.
translation.it: Voi siete i miei tre migliori amici.

translation.en: -[purple bear struggling] -Oh, right. Pasto.
[Pasto, muffled] My eyes must've fallen out!
translation.it: Mi sa che ho perso gli occhi.

translation.en: Pasto, come here. Let me help you out with that.
Thank you, David.
Ugh. Oh no. Look at this. I ruined your project.
translation.it: Oh, no, guardate. Ho rovinato il vostro progetto.

translation.en: No, you didn't ruin it. You fixed it.
translation.it: No, non l'hai rovinato. L'hai sistemato.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah! And you mixed up all the colors!
translation.it: Sì! E hai mischiato tutti i colori!

translation.en: [chuckles] This is why I love you guys. You're so creative.
translation.it: È per questo che vi adoro. Siete molto creativi. Non avete paura di combinare disastri.

translation.en: You aren't afraid to make a big mess.
translation.it: Siete molto creativi. Non avete paura di combinare disastri.

translation.en: Because that's where you find the masterpiece.
translation.it: Perché è così che crei un capolavoro.

translation.en: [David] So, what do you call this mess? I mean, um, masterpiece?
translation.it: E come si chiama questo disastro? Cioè, capolavoro?

translation.en: This is Paste-or, the giant robot from my solo show that opens tomorrow.
translation.it: Questo è Collor, il robot gigante del mio spettacolo di domani.

translation.en: -What? -You remember. You're the guest of honor.
Yeah, you can count on me, Pasto. I'll be there.
translation.it: Sì, conta su di me, Collino. Ci sarò.

translation.en: I'm counting on you. Look, and here's your ticket.
translation.it: Conto su di te. Ecco il tuo biglietto.

translation.en: It's very big for a ticket.
-Wow! I love these bubble letters. -Yeah. Brusho did the bubble letters.
translation.it: Adoro queste lettere in rilievo. Sì, le ha fatte Penny.

translation.en: Oh, well, they're really cool.
I know, but honestly, I did have a little inspiration.
translation.it: - Sono molto belle. - Lo so. Comunque io avevo un'ideuccia.

translation.en: Here. Have some Crittle Glitter. [giggles]
translation.it: Tieni, prendi un po' di polverina magica.

translation.en: Oh, uh, not tonight, 'cause tomorrow morning I got that big corporate project meeting.
translation.it: Stasera no. Domattina ho una riunione importante.

translation.en: Oh, you're going through with that corporate project?
translation.it: Vuoi continuare con quel progetto aziendale?

translation.en: 'Cause I thought you knew that if you did that, we'd never talk to you again.
translation.it: Pensavo sapessi che in quel caso non ti avremmo più parlato.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm kidding. That corporate project sounds cool.
Hey, stay here, have one cream soda, then we'll let you get to bed.
translation.it: Resta qui, bevi una bibita e poi ti lasciamo andare a letto.

translation.en: [chuckles] I knew you guys would understand. One cream soda, please.
translation.it: Sapevo che avreste capito. Una bibita, grazie.

translation.en: -[cans click open] -We're totally good.
[Argie B] Oh my gosh, guys!
You wanna see my dance?
David! David. David. David.
We've invited you to this big corporate project meeting
translation.it: Ti abbiamo invitato a questa importante riunione

translation.en: based on the strength of your portfolio.
translation.it: perché i tuoi progetti ci hanno colpito.

translation.en: It's very creative.
Yeah. Creative. [chuckles] You know what they say,
translation.it: Sì. Creativi. Sapete, bisogna fare disastri per creare un capolavoro.

translation.en: you gotta make a big mess to find the masterpiece.
translation.it: Sapete, bisogna fare disastri per creare un capolavoro.

translation.en: -[executive 1] Make a big mess? -David Gnubbens!
This corporation has rules.
Oh, no, no, no. It's, uh, it's just a… a metaphor.
I'm not making a… a literal mess. No, no. [chuckles nervously] I'll be good.
translation.it: Non sto facendo davvero disastri. No, sarò bravo.

translation.en: Very well, David, very well.
Now, we're going to take a chance on you and allow you to work
translation.it: Vogliamo puntare su di te e farti lavorare al nostro progetto principe:

translation.en: on the crown jewel of our empire,
translation.it: e farti lavorare al nostro progetto principe:

translation.en: the Bumpy B Subs logo.
translation.it: il logo della Bumpy B Subs.

translation.en: Oh wow, I've always loved the Bumpy's logo.
translation.it: Wow, mi è sempre piaciuto quel logo.

translation.en: It's so simple.
[gasps] He thinks it looks simple?
[executive 2] This logo took decades to perfect.
translation.it: Ci sono voluti decenni per perfezionarlo.

translation.en: When we tried a version with serif, our stock dropped 700%.
translation.it: Con la versione con grazie, le nostre azioni hanno perso il 700%.

translation.en: The last designer who worked on it killed himself!
translation.it: L'ultimo designer che ci ha lavorato si è suicidato!

translation.en: So, David, are you willing to dedicate your life to the Bumpy B?
translation.it: Allora, David, sei disposto a dedicare la tua vita al Bumpy B?

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Well, then prove it…
by eating this bowl of barf.
[chuckles nervously] Is this a joke?
Ah. Very well. Nice to know you. Kickoff over. Have a nice day.
translation.it: È stato un piacere. Sparisci. Buona giornata.

translation.en: No, no, no! I'll do it! I'll eat it! I'll eat the barf. I'll do it!
translation.it: No, ok, lo faccio, mangio il vomito!

translation.en: -[chuckles] David! David, we're kidding! -[executives laughing]
-Oh golly. Oh yeah. -You passed the test.
We're not monsters. We just love the Bumpy B more than anything.
translation.it: Non siamo mostri. Amiamo il Bumpy B più di ogni altra cosa.

translation.en: Me too.
Oh, you guys really got me. I thought that was real barf.
translation.it: Ci sono cascato. Pensavo fosse vero vomito.

translation.en: Well, the barf is real.
Oh, and it has been sitting out for some time.
translation.it: Ce l'abbiamo qui da un po'.

translation.en: Flanagan, please throw this in the rubbish and prepare David's contract.
translation.it: Flanagan, buttalo via e prepara il contratto di David.

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[wife, on phone] Hello?
[David] Honey, I've got great news! I'm designing the new Bumpy B!
translation.it: - Pronto? - Amore, grandi notizie! Progetterò il nuovo Bumpy B!

translation.en: -[wife] Brilliant! -This calls for champagne!
Oh, this is the life. Hey, hon, how's it going in there?
translation.it: Questa sì che è vita. Tesoro, a che punto sei?

translation.en: [wife] Be right out!
[in sensual voice] Look, the strap on my outfit broke.
translation.it: Guarda, la spallina si è rotta.

translation.en: Do you have any paste? I'll paste it back on and give you a show.
translation.it: Hai della colla? La riattacco e ti faccio uno spettacolino.

translation.en: Paste. Show. [gasps]
Pasto's show.
Oh no, um, uh… You know what?
I think I have to go outside and, uh, uh, take out the trash.
[in sensual voice] Now, David, don't you think the trash can wait?
translation.it: David, non credi che la spazzatura possa aspettare?

translation.en: Trust me, I can compete with a smelly bag of trash.
translation.it: Fidati, posso competere con un sacco di spazzatura puzzolente.

translation.en: You know what, actually? I think I'm gonna like not taking out the trash.
translation.it: Beh, sai, credo che mi piacerà non portarla fuori.

translation.en: Now where's that paste?
[sniffles] Well, I guess David hates me.
translation.it: Beh, immagino che David mi odi.

translation.en: David doesn't hate you. It was that evil corporate project meeting.
translation.it: Non ti odia. È colpa di quella riunione malvagia!

translation.en: It's turned him corporate!
Hey, uh, I don't want to stand. Can I take David's seat?
translation.it: Non voglio stare in piedi. Posso prendere il posto di David?

translation.en: No, no, no! He still might come.
You know the rules. No late entry. Now, Pasto, show us what you got.
translation.it: Conosci le regole. Niente ritardi. Ora facci vedere cosa sai fare.

translation.en: All right, Paste-or and I welcome you to the greatest… [voice breaks]
translation.it: Ok, io e Collor vi diamo il benvenuto al più grande,

translation.en: …funnest… [sobs]
…coolest show ever! [sobbing]
[sobbing] The Pasto Show!
Hey, Treybor, I bet if I gave you a ten-second head start, you couldn't beat me in a race.
translation.it: Treybor, scommetto che non mi batti nemmeno con dieci secondi di vantaggio!

translation.en: Yeah, right. I've always been the faster twin.
translation.it: Come no. Sono sempre stato il più veloce.

translation.en: You're on.
Okay. On your mark, get set, go!
I want my mommy! [grunts]
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!
translation.it: Uno, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto, nove, dieci!

translation.en: Hey, Treyb, I'm actually kinda jealous. You never told me you were taking a trip.
translation.it: Ehi, sono un po' invidioso. Anch'io vorrei farmi un tuffo.

translation.en: Ow. That wasn't cool, man.
But you know what is cool?
This super S.M.A.S.H.!-clusive movie preview
from your favorite star, Johnny Rash!
translation.it: con la tua star preferita, Johnny Rash!

translation.en: Check it out.
Hey, I'm Johnny Rash on the set of my new movie,
translation.it: Sono Johnny Rash, dal set del mio nuovo film.

translation.en: and you've never seen or heard me quite like this before.
translation.it: Non mi avete mai visto o sentito così.

translation.en: -[girls] We love you, Johnny. [smooch] -Ah, shut up. Check it out.
translation.it: Ti amiamo, Johnny. Ma dai. Guardate.

translation.en: [narrator] Tyler's new in town,
translation.it: Tyler è appena arrivato in città

translation.en: and he's about to learn that high school isn't all it's cracked up to be.
translation.it: e sta per scoprire che il liceo non è questo granché.

translation.en: -We have a new student. His name is Tyler. -[class laughing]
[narrator] But there's something a little different about Tyler.
translation.it: Ma Tyler ha qualcosa di diverso.

translation.en: He's a Rollerblader.
My skates!
[narrator] And when you Rollerblade at Hamilton High,
translation.it: E se pattini, alla Hamilton High,

translation.en: you don't exactly fit in.
Here. Take this.
A skateboard?
[narrator] But skateboarding isn't Tyler's only problem.
translation.it: Ma lo skateboard non è l'unico problema,

translation.en: -[Tyler screams] -[narrator] He's got a royally big secret.
translation.it: perché Tyler ha un grande segreto.

translation.en: Lauren, I have to be honest about something.
Yeah, tell me anything.
As you can see, I am…
not a fan of pizza.
[narrator] But his luck is about to change when Tyler finds…
translation.it: Ma il vento sta per cambiare quando Tyler trova…

translation.en: [narrator] …one million dollars.
Eat my dust, Jacob!
[narrator] But it's going to take a lot more than money…
You used to be different.
[narrator] …to win over the girl of Tyler's dreams.
translation.it: per conquistare la ragazza dei suoi sogni.

translation.en: Now you're like everyone else.
Come on, Lauren. Clearly I'm different than everyone else.
translation.it: Dai, Lauren. È chiaro che sono diverso.

translation.en: Look at me. I'm…
inside a sports car.
[narrator] And his world's about to turn upside down when he finds out…
translation.it: Il suo mondo sta per essere sconvolto quando scopre che…

translation.en: I'm on the Skyhawks?
Hey, Tyler, when the game's on the line, I'm passing you the rock.
translation.it: Tyler, nel momento decisivo ti passo la palla.

translation.en: Mo Jones knows my name?
translation.it: Mo Jones sa il mio nome?

translation.en: [narrator] But before he steps on the court, he's gotta go back in time…
translation.it: Ma prima di scendere in campo, deve tornare indietro nel tempo…

translation.en: Okay, now you dudes look weird.
translation.it: Ok, voi siete un po' strani.

translation.en: -[narrator] …and then go forward in time. -Whoa! Huh?
Hey, teach, my report's gonna be a little
translation.it: Maestro, il mio compito sarà un po'…

translation.en: different.
[playing rock music] ♪ That's why class is dismissed ♪
translation.it: E per questo la lezione è finita

translation.en: Hey, Martinez, not bad.
Here, you know what to do with this.
He's…
-[grunts] -…amazing.
-[mellow music playing] -[narrator] Matt Hartwell, Lottie Wolfe,
the Spider Brothers, and Johnny Rash as…
translation.it: i fratelli Spider e Johnny Rash nei panni de…

translation.en: the Video Game Master.
You forgot to mention one thing.
translation.it: Hai dimenticato di dire una cosa.

translation.en: I'm…
a ninth-grader.
Whoa, that movie looks zuzzy zazz.
-What? -What's wrong?
Still want your mommy?
[in slow motion voice] I want my mommy!
I was just trying to make you laugh.
No, you weren't.
Yeah, I was.
All right, we got some great cartoons next week,
translation.it: Ok, la prossima settimana ci saranno cartoni fantastici.

translation.en: including a brand-new Strongimals!
Yeah, and I'm on it.
-You're what? -Yup.
The Skipster's doing a voice.
I wonder what I'll look like all cartoonified.
Wow, that's, um…
Good… Good for you, Skip. That's great.
Until next week, kids.
Remember, you're never too old to yell,
translation.it: Alla prossima settimana, bambini. E non si è mai troppo grandi per urlare: "Voglio la mamma!"

translation.en: "I want my mommy!" [laughs]
translation.it: E non si è mai troppo grandi per urlare: "Voglio la mamma!"
